text: The 1914–15 Loyola Ramblers men's basketball team represents Loyola University Chicago during the 1914–15 college men's basketball season. The team finished the season with an overall record of 8–3. ==Schedule== |- ==References== Category:Loyola Ramblers men's basketball seasons Loyola Ramblers Loyola Ramblers Loyola Ramblers
title: 1914–15 Loyola Ramblers men's basketball team
